languages.text: "Чтобы служить Неумирающему, должно отсечь лишнее. Ты зришь самоотречение. Ты зришь долг".
"To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."
languages.original_text: "Чтобы служить Неумирающему, должно отсечь лишнее. Ты зришь самоотречение. Ты зришь долг".

traits.locale_text: "To serve the Undying Emperor, one must cut away the superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."
"To serve the Undying Emperor, one must cut away the superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."
"To serve the Undying Emperor, one must cut out all superfluous things. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."
"To serve the Undying Emperor, one must cut out all superfluous things. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."
"To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."
"To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."
"To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."

languages.text: "Um dem Todlosen Imperator zu dienen, muss man alles Überflüssige beseitigen. Was Ihr seht, ist Opfer. Was Ihr seht, ist Pflicht."
languages.original_text: "To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."

traits.locale_text: "Um dem Todlosen Imperator zu dienen, muss man alles Überflüssige beseitigen. Was Ihr seht, ist Opfer. Was Ihr seht, ist Pflicht."

languages.text: « Pour servir l'Empereur Immortel, il convient de se défaire de tout ce qui est superflu. Ce que vous voyez n'est autre que la marque du sacrifice. Et plus encore, celle du devoir. »
languages.original_text: "To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."

traits.locale_text: « Pour servir l'Empereur Immortel, il convient de se défaire de tout ce qui est superflu. Ce que vous voyez n'est autre que la marque du sacrifice. Et plus encore, celle du devoir. »

languages.text: «Para servir al Emperador Inmortal, hay que deshacerse de todo lo superfluo. Lo que ve es sacrificio. Lo que ve es el deber».
languages.original_text: "To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."

traits.locale_text: «Para servir al Emperador Inmortal, hay que deshacerse de todo lo superfluo. Lo que ve es sacrificio. Lo que ve es el deber».

languages.text: 「不死の皇帝に仕えるためには、余計なものはすべて取り除かなければなりません。あなたが見ているものは犠牲であり、任務なのです」
languages.original_text: "To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の皇帝に仕えるためには、余計なものはすべて取り除かなければなりません。あなたが見ているものは犠牲であり、任務なのです」

languages.text: “为了侍奉不死神皇，我们必须消灭所有多余的东西。你看到的是牺牲，也是责任。”
languages.original_text: "To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."

traits.locale_text: “为了侍奉不死神皇，我们必须消灭所有多余的东西。你看到的是牺牲，也是责任。”

languages.original_text: "To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen İmparator'a hizmet etmek için tüm aşırılıklardan arınmak gerekir. İşte bu gördüğün fedakârlıktır, vazifedir."
languages.original_text: "To serve the Undying Emperor, one must excise all that is superfluous. What you see is sacrifice. What you see is duty."
